S

setAcceptsDelayedFocus(boolean) - Method in class in.basulabs.audiofocuscontroller.AudioFocusController.Builder
Sets whether the app will accept delayed focus gain.
setAudioFocusChangeListener(AudioFocusController.OnAudioFocusChangeListener) - Method in class in.basulabs.audiofocuscontroller.AudioFocusController.Builder
Sets the AudioFocusController.OnAudioFocusChangeListener that will receive callbacks.
setContentType(int) - Method in class in.basulabs.audiofocuscontroller.AudioFocusController.Builder
Sets the attribute describing the content type of the audio signal, such as speech, or music.
setDurationHint(int) - Method in class in.basulabs.audiofocuscontroller.AudioFocusController.Builder
Sets the duration for which the audio will be played.
setPauseWhenAudioIsNoisy(boolean) - Method in class in.basulabs.audiofocuscontroller.AudioFocusController.Builder
Sets whether playback will be paused when audio becomes noisy.
setPauseWhenDucked(boolean) - Method in class in.basulabs.audiofocuscontroller.AudioFocusController.Builder
Sets whether the audio will be paused instead of ducking when AudioManager.AUDIOFOCUS_LOSS_TRANSIENT_CAN_DUCK is received.
setStream(int) - Method in class in.basulabs.audiofocuscontroller.AudioFocusController.Builder
Sets the audio stream for devices lower than Android Oreo.
setUsage(int) - Method in class in.basulabs.audiofocuscontroller.AudioFocusController.Builder
Sets the attribute describing what is the intended use of the audio signal.
